name: ntfy
description: ntfy is a self-hosted notification system that lets you send push notifications via HTTP or CLI without registration. It supports web UI, mobile clients, and topics for real-time messaging.
features: Simple notifications: Send push notifications via HTTP PUT/POST without registration or API keys.
Topic-based: Subscribe to topics to receive notifications without user accounts.
Multi-platform: Web UI, Android, iOS apps, and CLI for receiving notifications anywhere.
Instant delivery: Real-time push notifications using HTTP streaming or WebSockets.
Attachments: Send images, files, or links with notifications for rich content.
Priority levels: Set notification urgency from silent to critical with custom sounds.
Scheduled delivery: Delay notifications to send at specific times or after intervals.
Action buttons: Add clickable buttons to notifications for quick actions or links.
Email notifications: Receive notifications via email as fallback or preference.
Access control: Protect topics with passwords or tokens for private notifications.
Self-hosted or public: Run your own server or use the public ntfy.sh service.
No dependencies: Single binary deployment with built-in web server and storage.
